==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|添|水}}

===Etymology===
/soudu/ > /soːdu/ > /soːzu/. Etymology unknown, but likely cognate with either {{m|ja|僧都|tr=sōzu}} or {{m|ja|案山子|tr=sōzu}}.

===Pronunciation===
* {{IPA|[soːzu]|lang=ja}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|そうず|hhira=そうづ}}

# a traditional device found in Japanese gardens; composed of a bamboo tube that when filled with water revolves to empty and makes a clanking sound
